Sona.name: Sonaº
Sona.title: ºøMaven of the Stringsøº
Sona.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSona has no memories of her true parents. As an infant, she was found abandoned on the doorstep of an Ionian adoption house, nestled atop an ancient instrument in an exquisite case of unknown origins. She was an unusually well-behaved child, always quiet and content. Her caretakers were sure she would find a home quickly, but it soon became apparent that what they mistook for uncommon geniality was actually an inability to speak or to produce any sound whatsoever. Sona remained at the adoption house until her teens, watching in hopeless silence as prospective adopters passed her by. During this time, the caretakers sold her unusual instrument to anxious collectors, hoping to build her a trust. For a myriad of bizarre and unexpected reasons, however, it would be returned, or simply appear again outside the house.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen a wealthy Demacian woman named Lestara Buvelle learned of the instrument, she immediately embarked to Ionia. When the caretakers showcased the instrument for her, she rose wordlessly and explored the house, stopping outside Sona's room. Without hesitation, Lestara adopted her and left a generous donation for the instrument. With Lestara's guidance, Sona discovered a deep connection with the instrument which Lestara called an 'etwahl'. In her hands, it played tones which stilled or quivered the hearts of those around her. Within months, she was headlining with the mysterious etwahl for sold-out audiences. She played as though plucking heartstrings, effortlessly manipulating the emotions of her listeners - all without a single written note. In secret, she discovered a potent and deadly use for her etwahl, using its vibrations to slice objects from a distance. She honed this discipline in private, mastering her gift. When she felt prepared, she went to the only place which could offer her a fitting recital: the League of Legends.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºø''Her melody moves the soul, her silence sunders the body.''øºøºøº
ºøºø-- Jericho Swain, after attending her concertºøºøº

allytips: ºøºøºøºøMake use of Hymn of Valor's bonus ability power for empowering your next spell.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøSave Crescendo for the game-altering moment.ºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºConstantly switching between Song of Celerity and Aria of Perseverance will grant you maximum survivability.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºSpread out when you see Sona so she can't make your entire team dance.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøKill Sona first, as she will heal up her team if left alone for too long.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøHymn of Valorº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSona plays the Hymn of Valor, granting nearby allied champions bonus Damage and Ability Power. Additionally, casting this ability sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to the nearest two enemy champions or monsters.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøPersistent Aura:ººøºøºøºø Increases the Attack Damage and Ability Power of nearby allied Champions by ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }}.

ºActivation:º Deals º{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes Champions).ºøºøºøº

ºøPower Chord - Staccato:ºøººøºø Deals double power chord damage.ºøº

spells.name: ºøAria of Perseveranceøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSona plays the Aria of Perseverance, granting nearby allied champions bonus Armor and Magic Resist. Additionally, casting this ability sends out healing melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøPersistent Aura:ººøº Grants nearby allied Champions ºøº{{ e1 }}ºøº bonus Armor and Magic Resist.ºøº

ºActivation:ººøºøºø Heals Sona and the most wounded nearby allied Champion for øºøºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) ºand grants º{{ e1 }}ºøºøº additional Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.ºøºøº

ºøPower Chord - Diminuendo:ºøººøºøºø Reduces an enemy's total damage output by 20% for 3 seconds.øºøºøº

spells.name: ºøSong of Celerityº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºSona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allied champions bonus Movement Speed. Additionally, casting this ability energizes nearby allies with a burst of speed.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøPersistent Aura:ººøº Grants nearby allied Champions ºøº{{ e1 }}ºø bonus Movement Speed.øº

ºActivation:ººø Grants nearby allies øº{{ e2 }}ºøºø% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.ºøº

ºøPower Chord - Tempo:øººøºø Slows an enemy by 40% for 2 seconds.ºøº

spells.name: ºCrescendoº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøSona plays her ultimate chord, forcing enemy champions to dance and dealing magic damage to them.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºStrikes an irresistible chord forcing enemy Champions to dance for 1.5 seconds and take ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

passive.name: ºPower Chordº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAfter casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona is currently playing.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
